Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 24 Aug 2018For the 'safest' among what you mentioned, options may be the one. Cos it is still possible to repair the trade if it goes against you. Not exactly the fastest earning but quite consistent, possible to get about 3% or more month on month or so. Don't really need extensive use of charts as well if you know how. 0 comments1
